reviews.text: Not tasting any donut more of a lemon cookie. Lemon is very strong
Love this recipe! doughnut doesn't come out too strong but tastes insane! awesome job.

I enjoy this it's a bit of a coil killer due to the Fa I pulled the cap.glazed donut and put  Fa zeppola in at 3.5% this brings that donut note up to were it should be dissent help the long steep time but makes a much better vape I.M.O good job Wayne 
REMEMBER if you mix it review it!!

Very surprised how good this is fresh after mixing, reminds me of bedrock ice cream donuts by ruthless, but even better, creamier and the full donut base is tasty. Need to make a bigger bottle to see how it steeps

More cookie to me. Donut is tame. 
Flavor is pretty good. Wrecks coils with the quickness.
After two weeks this is awesome. My new favorite cereal vape. I never thought cap glazed doughnut served a purpose in this world until now
Amazing gave it a 7 day steep and imalready mixing more to be ready for next week had to use fw crunchy fruit cereal instead because couldnt get fruity flakes and its amazing i cant stop vaping it
Saw this and had to mix it up... Didn't have CAP Glazed Doughnut so I used TPA Frosted Donut @ 2.5% and also added TPA Bavarian Cream @ 1% for more of a cream filling... Great job Wayne! üëçüëç
i made some changes to my liking but very tasty juice. definetly wont last a week to see how it steeps.. i added some fa zeppola and lowered the vbic and added some ooo cream
